{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = X80-5g media sample.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 5G Whole Home Wi-Fi 6 Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/us/deco-mesh-wifi/product-family/deco-x80-5g/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Incompatible |openwrtsupport = Not Supported |tomatosupport = Incompatible |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Deco X80 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -5G |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2024/04/05 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/tp-link/x80-5g_v1 |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, LTE gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8074A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (aarch64) |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59D1G81MB-45TI; <!-- GigaDevice PSR1GA30DT ? --> |flash1size = 256 <!-- 256 ? --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = ESMT;M15T4G16256A-DEBG2G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm;QCA8081; |sw_cpu = true |voip_ports = 1 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = SIM Slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 115200, 8N1, 1.8V |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, LTE |addchip = Qualcom 5G RG50xQ |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 4804 |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/tp-link/x80-5g_v1}} [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/ipq8074a-tp-link-deco-x80-5g-info-thread/176308 On the '''OpenWrt''' Forum]
Modem System-On-Chip: Qualcomm 5G RG50xQ (Snapdragon X55 platform)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
